amdgpu: If CPU isnot AMD, this your eGPU
amdgpu1: If CPU&GPU==AMD, this is the eGPU
upordown: Display if your internet connection is up or down
publiccountryiso: Display your public country ISO code
cputemp[FC]?: CPU temperature, optionally in Fahrenheit (F), default in Celsius (C)
nvgputemp[FC]?: Nvidia GPU Temperature, optionally in Fahrenheit (F) default Celsius (C)
